text: Ephraim Lerkin (born 27 November 1997) is a Papua New Guinean track and field athlete. He competed at the 2017 World Championships running in the men's 400 metres hurdles. He competed in the same event at the 2018 Commonwealth Games in the Australia, where he ran 52.17 seconds without advancing to the final. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Papua New Guinean male hurdlers
title: Ephraim Lerkin
